title: Thorpe Hesley F.C.
text:
Thorpe Hesley F.C. was an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Thorpe%20Hesley">Thorpe Hesley</a>, <a href="Rotherham">Rotherham</a>, <a href="South%20Yorkshire">South Yorkshire</a>.
History.
Thorpe Hesley were formed at the outset of the 20th century, entering the <a href="Hatchard%20League">Hatchard League</a> for the first time in 1902. Two years later they made their <a href="FA%20Cup">FA Cup</a> debut, reaching the 2nd qualifying round, an achievement they would equal in 1906 (being disqualified after a replay with <a href="Hoyland%20Town%20F.C.">Hoyland Town</a>). The club disbanded in 1911.
Notable former players.
Players that have played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> either before or after playing for Thorpe Hesley –
